document_data.name: Agada Vane
document_data.mainbody: '''Agada Vane''' was a shopkeeper in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Agada was a fierce competitor and fair employer but also had a softer side, which she showed at tea-parties.
document_data.Activities: Agada was a regular customer at the [[Yawning Portal]] inn. She had a successful shop that sold metalwork for the home and dry goods. Agada organized weekly tea-parties in order to gossip. Secretly, she was also a personal spy of the [[Open Lord]] [[Dagult Neverember]] in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep]].
document_data.Relationship: Agada was respected by the lords, merchant community, and by the guilds.
document_data.History: In 1479 DR, Lord Neverember ordered Agada to keep an eye on [[Sanfin Lotte]], whom the lord distrusted. Agada grew convinced that Sanfin's secret was his [[parakeet]] [[Chloe (bird)|Chloe]] and started investigating it.
